channel.title: Facebook - message on enter
channel.description: So I wonder if any of you have noticed. There was an update on FaceBook which allowed you to send your message on enter. I accidentally enabled this and would like to turn it back off as it is extremely annoying and I like to use enter a lot. Does anybody know of how to do this?

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Rash:

shft+enter

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:387125”][quote author=Facebook Help Center]
The blue comment button is missing when I click to comment on a post.
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or retur…
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or return key. The comment will still publish.

Keep in mind if you want to create a new paragraph or line break within your comment, you’ll need to press shift+enter. [/quote]

Doesn’t look like we’ll be able to disable it =\

You know, I’m thinking about making a social networking site that uses some level of common sense.[/quote]
Friend at school did this for our school (for fun…), but his ‘server’ crashed and he never bothered with it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:387125”][quote author=Facebook Help Center]
The blue comment button is missing when I click to comment on a post.
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or retur…
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or return key. The comment will still publish.

Keep in mind if you want to create a new paragraph or line break within your comment, you’ll need to press shift+enter. [/quote]

Doesn’t look like we’ll be able to disable it =\

You know, I’m thinking about making a social networking site that uses some level of common sense.[/quote]

GL?

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:387125”][quote author=Facebook Help Center]
The blue comment button is missing when I click to comment on a post.
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or retur…
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or return key. The comment will still publish.

Keep in mind if you want to create a new paragraph or line break within your comment, you’ll need to press shift+enter. [/quote]

Doesn’t look like we’ll be able to disable it =\

You know, I’m thinking about making a social networking site that uses some level of common sense.[/quote]
You might be able to make a movie like Facebook did well based off of it. :rolleyes:

I don’t use Facebook as the website, I have it connected to the phone, but that is a worthless update and hope they come to realize that their updates are stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Facebook Help Center”]The blue comment button is missing when I click to comment on a post.
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or retur…
If you don’t see a blue comment button, just press your enter or return key. The comment will still publish.

Keep in mind if you want to create a new paragraph or line break within your comment, you’ll need to press shift+enter.[/quote]

Doesn’t look like we’ll be able to disable it =\

You know, I’m thinking about making a social networking site that uses some level of common sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I was on facebook a few minutes after the update, and it said “press enter to post your comment”, but pressing enter would only create another line.
I hate the “update” though.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:5, topic:387125”][quote author=Rash link=topic=482923.msg3536714#msg3536714 date=1300596594]
shft+enter
[/quote]

I know you can do it that way, I’m just not used to doing that. :P[/quote]

Same.
Ill write a comment back, and post like 3 or 4.

Read full topic

item.title: Facebook - message on enter
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Chassy13:

Talk about worthless updates. They keep updating things that no one cares about yet they can’t satisfy 10 million groups making petitions for a dislike button. If anyone finds out how to disable this, post it. I’m used to hitting enter to make a new line, not submit my message…

shft+enter

Read full topic
